text: Polls to elect representatives of headmasters of higher secondary schools to the Bharathidasan University Senate would be held on April 11. A representative each from the districts of Tiruchi, Thanjavur, Pudukottai, Karur, Perambalur, Ariyalur, Tiruvarur and Nagapattinam would be elected, C.Thiruchelvam, Registrar, Bharathidasan University, said in a press release. Nomination forms for the election would be issued from March 10 to 21. More details can be had from the respective Chief Educational Officers.
title: Senate polls
